class gen_coap_service.pro.GenCoAPServiceSetup(verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: ats_utilities.config_io.base_check.FileChecking

Defined class GenCoAPServiceSetup with attribute(s) and method(s). Generate module file generator_test.py by template and parameters. It defines:

attributes:
GEN_VERBOSE - console text indicator for process-phase.
PRO_STRUCTURE - project setup (template, module).
__reader - reader API.
__writer - writer API.
__config - project setup in yaml format.
methods:
__init__ - initial constructor.
get_reader - getter for template reader.
get_writer - getter for template writer.
gen_setup - generate module file setup.py.
__str__ - dunder method for GenCoAPServiceSetup.
